name: Transmachina
description:
Transmachina is a bite-sized metroidvania game about a scout robot exploring a biolab. Learn new abilities, explore the rooms for upgrades, destroy enemy sentries and fight a boss. This was made in a month, and is  is my entry for Metroidvania Month XVI.

You can play on Keyboard and/or Gamepad, and there is a WebGL version and a Windows Build. 

Controls:

Keyboard

  • WASD or Arrows - Move
  • J  or Left Ctrl - Blaster
  • L or Left Shift - Dash
  • K or Space - Jump / Confirm
  • Escape - Cancel

Gamepad

  • D-PAD or Left Analog - Move
  • West Button - Blaster
  • East Button - Dash / Cancel
  • South Button - Jump / Confirm

This game was developed by using Unity, LMMS, Aseprite, and a few other helper tools.

It also uses an open-source library (developed by me) that helps with general-purpose development: https://github.com/ConradoClark/Licht

You can find the source code of the game here:  https://github.com/ConradoClark/mvm16-transmachination

Credits

  • Sounds, music, graphics, programming, and design made by me, Thinker (@FrostyChao, aka conradoclark here on itch)
  • Fonts used: https://www.dafont.com/teeny-tiny-pixls.font / https://www.dafont.com/enter-command.font

(There's no way yet to open golden doors, just in case anyone wonders that)

It was quite a challenge to pull this off and it's not perfect, but I'm kinda glad with the end result, and I learned a lot during the whole process.

Please let me know if anything is not working properly! (There will be bugs, surely!) Thank you so much for dropping by.
